RULES_REQUIRED: At least one rule is required
ORDER_MINIMUM: Order must have a minimum value of 1
ESCALATION_RULE_ORDER_INVALID: The order of rules are expected to be in ascending
ESCALATE_TO_REQUIRED: Each rule must escalated to at least a user, or a team or a schedule
ESCALATION_RULE_MINS_AFTER_INVALID: Minutes after is expected to be in ascending order
RULES_LIMIT_REACHED: The maximum no of rules that can be added are 99, please try again
